channel.title: CVE Feed for Freedesktop -- accountsservice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Freedesktop -- accountsservice

item.title: CVE-2020-16126|2024-09-16T17:15:27.923Z -- freedesktop -- accountsservice
item.description: An Ubuntu-specific modification to AccountsService in versions before 0.6.55-0ubuntu13.2, among other earlier versions, improperly dropped the ruid, allowing untrusted users to send signals to AccountService, thus stopping it from handling D-Bus messages in a timely fashion.

item.title: CVE-2020-16127|2024-09-16T17:58:49.219Z -- freedesktop -- accountsservice
item.description: An Ubuntu-specific modification to AccountsService in versions before 0.6.55-0ubuntu13.2, among other earlier versions, would perform unbounded read operations on user-controlled ~/.pam_environment files, allowing an infinite loop if /dev/zero is symlinked to this location.
